This process not only deepened my knowledge of control systems but also significantly enhanced my ability to develop practical and effective engineering solutions.

System stability analysis and performance evaluation

September 2024 - June 2025 | Graduation Project

Project Summary:

Technical Approach:
‚Ä¢ Special experimental setup design and production for electrodynamic levitation system
‚Ä¢ Development of AI-based models to understand and control non-linear system dynamics

‚Ä¢ Comprehensive simulation studies in MATLAB/Simulink environment to verify model and controller performance
‚Ä¢ Experimental data collection and analysis processes through physical prototype

Development Experience: In this project, I built a strong technical foundation with languages like C++ and Python. This work, which provided me with in-depth knowledge in control systems and data-driven solutions, strengthened my expertise in AI-based modeling and simulation.

Results: I successfully controlled the system, advancing my practical engineering competencies in AI, data-driven modeling, and control systems to an advanced level.
